text: "Photograph" is a 1983 song by English heavy metal band Def Leppard and is the lead single to their third studio album Pyromania. It went to number 12 in the United States, number 32 in Canada and number 66 in the United Kingdom. In 2008 the band duetted with singer Taylor Swift for CMT Crossroads. title: Photograph (Def Leppard song)
